text_block_list.text:
(――It's been a while since 
Trainer-san became my trainer.)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
choice_data_list: So in this case, you'd use……

text_block_list.text: (……And, today, like most days, they're teaching me English)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(Hmmmmm~. I'm the one that asked, but is this really okay~? 
This person is supposed to be my trainer for running)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(Fundamentally, they're a serious person. You could say 
their passion and seriousness are on full display)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: Haaa…… Haaa……!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: 『The last straight!! Keep going!!』
『The last straight!! Keep going!!』
(Back then, they were really really passionate……)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: 『That's not all you've got!!』
『That's not all you've got!!』
(I wondered why they were so desperate~)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(But, it really was something that they could keep coming 
up with those lines. ……that's what happens when you 
have a wide vocabulary, I guess? Right?)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(They're really enthusiastic. 
……When I think back, it's a little……)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: Fu, fufuu……
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Ah. I'm listening, I was listening! 
Sorry, I'll properly…… ummmm, this word~……
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(This won't do. It's pretty rude to stop listening and think 
about other things when I'm the one that asked, isn't it?)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Gratitude~? To your trainer? Isn't it fine either way? 
Isn't it normal for them to look after you?
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text:
Hmmm~? Is that how it is? 
Is it really okay to include studying in that?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Isn't that just how it is? Besides, if your grades are bad, 
doesn't that mean you won't be able to properly train? 
There's supplementary lessons after all.
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text:
Ah~……I suppose so? So I guess that means this is just 
one part of a trainer's work too…… huh~? Really~??
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! Trainer-san, 
let's keep going! I can still run!
text_block_list.name: Dream-chasing Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: I know. But, no. We're stopping here.
text_block_list.name: Dream-chasing Trainer

text_block_list.text: But! In the next race…… I definitely want to win!
text_block_list.name: Dream-chasing Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
There's the next race, and the one after that right? Which means 
we should think about the future too. So we can keep winning……!
text_block_list.name: Dream-chasing Trainer

text_block_list.text:
(Focusing on victory, huh? Even just watching them as an 
outsider, I can tell there's a difference in passion~)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san is more like them, right? 
I wonder if they have any thoughts about that.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Even with that difference, I wonder if it's still fun~. 
They're not getting bored right~?……wait, huh?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: (……Heh. They're humming while getting ready)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, are you…… having fun now?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
choice_data_list: Of course! I'm expecting great things!

text_block_list.text: O-oh…… you're energetic even before training, huh?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
choice_data_list: You can do it! Do your best!

text_block_list.text:
Wai-, why are you as enthusiastic as when I'm running? 
……Fuu, ahahahaa. You're too spirited!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(……Are they doing that on purpose? Are they trying to be 
considerate? Or is a conversation like this part of the 『fun』?)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text: …… Okaaaay.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
(While I might not be able to match that energy and enthusiasm…… 
just watching Trainer-san is kinda fun for me too)
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Well…… guess I can just think about it later. 
For now, I'll do my best today too~.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
